programme.title: Black Monday remembered
programme.short_synopsis: Memories of the global stock market crash of 19th October 1987.
programme.medium_synopsis: On the anniversary of the day Roosevelt closed every bank in America, Alistair Cooke remembers Black Monday, the huge stock market crash of 19th October 1987.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
